name: Bob the Blob (mser, NoNinja)
description:
LMB - Stick / RMB - Jump

Space - Jump

White Crosshair - Can stick to surface / Red Crosshair - Can't stick to surfaces

We highly recommend you to download the game to have more fun!

This game was made for ScoreSpaceJam#9 with the theme "Climbing". Bob the Blob it's a physics based platformer, where you have to carefully climb to the the top with your ability to stick to surfaces. The faster you'll do this, then more score you gain, the game also counts your jumps, sticks and falls amount, just as the time, the less you do the more score you get. Try yourself as a speedrunner and try beat the highest scores.

The game is mostly inspired by Getting Over It and The End is Nigh.
